name: The Jetpack of Fate
description:
Once upon a time, there was a boy whose dream was to have a jetpack. One day, he entered his room, it was then that he saw a huge present.

All excited, and in a hurry, he opened the gift and that's when he came across his new jetpack.

All happy and excited, he immediately decided to try out his new acquisition, it was then that he went up to the roof of his house. He put his jetpack on his back, went to the edge of the roof and pressed the button, but when he pressed the button, he pressed it too hard, and shot towards the sun, where he ended up being burned.
